132.movie_plot: A heroic young pilot launches his own rescue mission when his father, an Air Force veteran, is shot down over enemy territory and captured.

147.movie_plot: Follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

140.movie_plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

119.movie_plot: After iron man Drago, a highly intimidating 6-foot-5, 261-pound Soviet athlete, kills Apollo Creed in an exhibition match, Rocky comes to the heart of Russia for 15 pile-driving boxing rounds of revenge.

151.movie_plot: A homeless man is hired as a survival guide for a group of wealthy businessmen on a hunting trip in the mountains, unaware that they are killers who hunt humans for sport, and that he is their new prey.

153.movie_plot: As the Allied armies close in, the Germans decide to blow up the last Rhine bridge, trapping their own men on the wrong side. But will it happen?

118.movie_plot: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

138.movie_plot: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

137.movie_plot: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

139.movie_plot: Two researchers in a green alternative energy project are put on the run when they are framed for murder and treason.

128.movie_plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

125.movie_plot: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

141.movie_name: Battle for the Planet of the Apes (1973)
141.movie_plot: One decade after a worldwide series of ape revolutions and a brutal nuclear war among humans, Caesar must protect survivors of both species from an insidious human cult and a militant ape faction alike.

127.movie_plot: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

121.movie_plot: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

122.movie_plot: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

135.movie_plot: With the aid from a New York City policeman, a top immigrant cop tries to stop drug-trafficking and corruption by immigrant Chinese Triads, but things get complicated when the Triads try to bribe the policeman.

129.movie_plot: A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.

134.movie_plot: A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

144.movie_plot: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

124.movie_plot: Reluctantly retired from boxing, and back from riches to rags, Rocky takes on a new protege who betrays him, as the champ's son must adjust to his family's new life after bankruptcy.

150.movie_plot: A tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture a renegade computer hacker on the run from the law.

136.movie_plot: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

133.movie_plot: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

152.movie_plot: A retired DEA agent is out to hunt down and take out a Jamaican drug posse that has targeted he and his family for murder.

120.movie_plot: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

146.movie_plot: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks in which he randomly goes out and kills would-be muggers on the mean streets after dark.

123.movie_plot: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

148.movie_plot: Various interconnected people struggle to survive when an earthquake of unimaginable magnitude hits Los Angeles.

143.movie_plot: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who have taken over the ship first.

142.movie_plot: A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

149.movie_plot: Conservative street cop DaSilva reluctantly agrees to terminate an international terrorist who has demanded media attention. But DaSilva's "at-home" tactics are very much put to the challenge.

130.movie_plot: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

145.movie_name: King Kong vs. Godzilla (Kingukongu tai Gojira) (1962)
145.movie_plot: A pharmaceutical company captures King Kong and brings him to Japan, where he escapes from captivity and battles a recently released Godzilla.

116.movie_plot: Private Luc Deveraux and his sadistic sergeant, Andrew Scott, got killed in Vietnam. The army uses their bodies for a secret project - reanimating dead soldiers as deadly obedient cyborgs. However, their memories come back too.

117.movie_plot: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

126.movie_plot: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding an American General prisoner... but that's not all that's really going on.

131.movie_plot: An ex-tennis pro carries out a plot to murder his wife. When things go wrong, he improvises a brilliant plan B.

50.movie_plot: A local sheriff, a marine biologist and an old seafarer team up to hunt down a great white shark wrecking havoc in a beach resort.

12.movie_plot: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hit man who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

63.movie_plot: A former L.A. drug dealer tries to go straight but his past and his underworld connections bring him into the focus of the DEA, the Mexican feds and the Mexican drug cartels.

82.movie_plot: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

104.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

41.movie_plot: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

79.movie_plot: A veteran policeman, Murtaugh, is partnered with a younger, suicidal officer, Riggs. They both have one thing in common: hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

2.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
2.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

53.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

49.movie_plot: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to the mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.

21.movie_plot: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

92.movie_plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

26.movie_plot: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight heavy-weight champion Apollo Creed in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

18.movie_plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

97.movie_plot: A crew in Antarctica finds a neighboring camp destroyed and its crew dead. Whatever killed them is nowhere to be found, unless it's hidden in plain sight.

22.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
22.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

34.movie_plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

73.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

28.movie_plot: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

44.movie_plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

55.movie_plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist, while both sides attempt to find balance between their personal and their professional lives.

0.movie_name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975)
0.movie_plot: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

114.movie_plot: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.

113.movie_plot: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

61.movie_plot: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

9.movie_plot: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

72.movie_plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

56.movie_plot: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

69.movie_plot: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

6.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
6.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

52.movie_plot: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

16.movie_plot: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone who must continue her battle against the aliens. Along with a crew of space pirates, Ripley must also prevent the deadly aliens from reaching Earth.

14.movie_plot: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

43.movie_plot: In 1881, cattle baron John Chisum pays a bounty to Patrick Floyd Garrett to kill outlaw Billy the Kid.

11.movie_plot: When C.I.A. Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an I.R.A. assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

90.movie_plot: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

45.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
45.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

78.movie_plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

110.movie_plot: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

99.movie_plot: Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

106.movie_plot: With the help of a magic ticket, a young film fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action film character.

96.movie_plot: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

38.movie_plot: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

35.movie_plot: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

10.movie_plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

7.movie_plot: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard (Jones) and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan (Snipes), who has been accused of a double-murder.

112.movie_plot: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

70.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

81.movie_plot: In Africa during World War I, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

85.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)
85.movie_plot: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

77.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

62.movie_plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

23.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

102.movie_plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

103.movie_plot: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

75.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
75.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

76.movie_plot: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.

115.movie_plot: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

46.movie_name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (1974)
46.movie_plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

39.movie_plot: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child who dark forces want to eliminate.

105.movie_plot: "Rambo" parody in which Topper Harley leads a rescue team into Iraq to save Iraqi war prisoners and all of their previous rescue teams.

36.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

101.movie_plot: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

1.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

83.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

4.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
4.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

20.movie_plot: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

111.movie_plot: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

29.movie_plot: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

91.movie_plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

84.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

87.movie_plot: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

25.movie_plot: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

30.movie_plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

3.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

32.movie_plot: Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.

40.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
40.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

48.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

64.movie_plot: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

88.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

68.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

37.movie_plot: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former LAPD officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to local street gangs.

74.movie_plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

31.movie_plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.

98.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

71.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

100.movie_plot: James Bond heads to The Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by SPECTRE agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

93.movie_plot: An idyllic sci-fi future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of 30.

33.movie_plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

19.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)
19.movie_plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

47.movie_plot: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

5.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

80.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

51.movie_name: Good, The Bad and The Ugly, The (1966)
51.movie_plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

27.movie_plot: A gunslinger is embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

13.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

8.movie_plot: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

95.movie_plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

42.movie_plot: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

60.movie_plot: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

108.movie_plot: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. Agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

67.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

54.movie_plot: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

24.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

59.movie_plot: A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.

94.movie_plot: A barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his parents and his tribe whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his henchmen when he was a boy.

65.movie_plot: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

58.movie_plot: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

89.movie_plot: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

86.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

15.movie_plot: After a successful heist, Porter is shot by his wife and his best friend. They leave him there to die but when he recovers, he seeks revenge and wants his share of the money.

17.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

57.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

109.movie_plot: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

107.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.
